title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Quarterly Accounts
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Quarterly Accounts 
Survey) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 January 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (quarterly account survey) order 2020 (2) order come operation 2 january 2021

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: In this Order -
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order - 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 

“survey” means the Quarterly Accounts Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information 
referred to in Article 4.
text_norm: 2 order - quarter mean period 3 month ending 31 march 30 june 30 september 31 december year survey mean quarterly account survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information referred article 4

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 3. Article 4 applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. Article 4 applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any of the following sections of NACE Rev. 2 set out in 
Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 20 December 20061, as amended by Regulation (EC) 
No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 
20082, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 18 January 20123 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20194 - 

(a) B to E, 

(b) G, 

(c) H to N, 

(d) R, or 

(e) S. 

1 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
3 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
4 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [649] 3

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: A requirement on undertakings referred to in Article 3,
text_raw:
4. 

A requirement on undertakings referred to in Article 3, 

(a) 

subject to subparagraph (b), to provide, for the purpose of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in 
the Schedule in relation to each quarter in the period from 1 
January 2021 to 31 December 2025, and 

(b) 

to provide the information in relation to each quarter in the 
period referred to in paragraph (a), once only, 

is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking referred article 3 (a) subject subparagraph (b) provide purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation quarter period 1 january 2021 31 december 2025 (b) provide information relation quarter period referred paragraph (a) hereby prescribed

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 5. The Statistics (Quarterly Accounts Surveys) Order 2016 (S.I. No. 501
text_raw:
5. The Statistics (Quarterly Accounts Surveys) Order 2016 (S.I. No. 501 
of 2016) is revoked. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [649]
text_norm: 5 statistic (quarterly account surveys) order 2016 (s.i no 501 2016) revoked 4 649

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Article 4

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
1. 
Information regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 
concerned and specifying the quarterly period to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

the number of persons engaged in a particular week; 

(b) particulars in relation to the stocks and work in progress at the 
start and the end of the quarterly period, including the total 
value for accounting purposes of such stocks and work in 
progress; 

(c) 

particulars in relation to capital assets in the quarterly period, 
including changes in such capital assets, separately identifying - 

(i) 

the total additions to capital assets, and 

(ii) 

the total receipt on sales of capital assets.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates undertaking concerned specifying quarterly period information relates (a) number person engaged particular week (b) particular relation stock work progress start end quarterly period including total value accounting purpose stock work progress (c) particular relation capital asset quarterly period including change capital asset separately identifying - (i) total addition capital asset (ii) total receipt sale capital asset

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to
text_raw:
2. 
Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to 
complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 17 December 2020 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach.
